Articles.Content:
So, after the update to 1.4.1.2089 (auto-update via Steam) my mission objectives will no longer trigger, and simple ones at that: "Conduct temperature surveys" (all three types: on surface, below x altitude, above x altitude), "Ferry tourists/VIP" (to suborbit/orbit), etc. This is an issue with both the 64-bit and 32-bit application. Anyone else been having issues like this since the update? Any fixes?

OS: Windows 7 Pro SP1 64-bit
